Package com.icl.saxon.aelfred

This package is a modified version of the AElfred XML parser from www.microstar.com.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultHandler This class extends the SAX base handler class to support the SAX2 Lexical and Declaration handlers.
SAXDriver An enhanced SAX2 version of Microstar's Ælfred XML parser.
SAXParserFactoryImpl Implements the JAXP 1.1 ParserFactory interface.
SAXParserImpl  
 

Package com.icl.saxon.aelfred Description

This package is a modified version of the AElfred XML parser from www.microstar.com.

Modifications made by David Brownell are:

  • Reporting comments to the application
  • Fixing a number of bugs
  • Adding a SAX2 driver

Additional modifications by Michael Kay:

  • Fixing a bug in the SAX2 driver
  • Changing the package structure

Michael H. Kay
12 April 2000
